text: The following lists events that happened in 1948 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Sveinn Björnsson *Prime Minister - Stefán Jóhann Stefánsson ==Events== ==Births== Davíð Oddsson, Prime Minister 1991-2004 *8 January - Þuríður Backman, politician *14 January - Davíð Oddsson, politician *10 February - Sigurbergur Sigsteinsson, handball player *17 June - Hrafn Gunnlaugsson, film director *17 July - Ögmundur Jónasson, politician. *25 July - Elmar Geirsson, footballer *30 July - Sigurður Pálsson, writer *7 August - Vilmundur Gylfason, politician, historian and poet (d. 1983) *19 November - Hanna María Karlsdóttir, actress ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1940s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1948 in Iceland
